Birthday.content: I'm a big fan of Kurt Cobain. I put a picture of him holding a gun on my Instagram for his birthday. He's definitely one of my favorite rock artists.
Birthday.author: Prodigy

Birthday.content: If someone close to me forgets my birthday, I am heartbroken.
Birthday.author: Parineeti Chopra

Birthday.content: I had a 'Cats' phase, where I did lots of overturned furniture and trash cans. I asked for a fog machine for my birthday.
Birthday.author: Ben Platt

Birthday.content: People give one another things that can't be gift wrapped.
Birthday.author: Nadine Gordimer

Birthday.content: One of my favorite memories was one time Prince picked me up and said we were going to Michael Jordan's birthday party.
Birthday.author: Tamron Hall

Birthday.content: If you're going to do a job, do it right. If you're going to throw a birthday party, make it amazing. If you're going to do anything, do it awesome.
Birthday.author: Jimmy John Liautaud

Birthday.content: I'm actually a perpetual 13-year-old. I've never advanced beyond 13. Every day, tomorrow is my 14th birthday. That's my kind of humor.
Birthday.author: Terry Crews

Birthday.content: Did you know you're supposed to soap and scrub for as long as it takes to sing 'Happy Birthday' twice?
Birthday.author: Faith Salie

Birthday.content: We have to be able to grow up. Our wrinkles are our medals of the passage of life. They are what we have been through and who we want to be.
Birthday.author: Lauren Hutton

Birthday.content: There is still no cure for the common birthday.
Birthday.author: John Glenn

Birthday.content: It's in my stars to invent; I was born on Madame Curie's birthday. I have this need for originals, for innovation. That's why I like Charlie Parker.
Birthday.author: Joni Mitchell

Birthday.content: I love the big fresh starts, the clean slates like birthdays and new years, but I also really like the idea that we can get up every morning and start over.
Birthday.author: Kristin Armstrong

Birthday.content: I gave a funny speech at my wife's birthday party, and I'm thinking, 'Hey, I've still got it.'
Birthday.author: Larry David

Birthday.content: My first proper kiss was from Cara Shucksmith when I was 13 or 14 at her birthday party.
Birthday.author: Robert Webb

Birthday.content: The return of my birthday, if I remember it, fills me with thoughts which it seems to be the general care of humanity to escape.
Birthday.author: Samuel Johnson

Birthday.content: Every year, I think you earn the right to eat cake on your birthday.
Birthday.author: Bret Hart

Birthday.content: My biggest hero, Gregory Peck, was my birthday present on April 14, 1973. I just sat and stared at him.
Birthday.author: Loretta Lynn

Birthday.content: I think, at a child's birth, if a mother could ask a fairy godmother to endow it with the most useful gift, that gift should be curiosity.
Birthday.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Birthday.content: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
Birthday.author: Satchel Paige

Birthday.content: My every birthday wish was, 'I want to someday be on TV.'
Birthday.author: Awkwafina

Birthday.content: I don't set up screenings. I can barely plan my kid's birthday party.
Birthday.author: Becky Albertalli

Birthday.content: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
Birthday.author: Dr. Seuss

Birthday.content: I've been singing since I could talk. I started playing the piano when I was about 5 or 6. I picked up the guitar on my 20th birthday.
Birthday.author: Grace Potter

Birthday.content: I'm not materialistic. I believe in presents from the heart, like a drawing that a child does.
Birthday.author: Victoria Beckham

Birthday.content: My mom kicked me out a couple of weeks before my 18th birthday. I had a job for about six, seven months at a supermarket, and they fired me for being late.
Birthday.author: Cardi B

Birthday.content: It takes a long time to become young.
Birthday.author: Pablo Picasso

Birthday.content: I definitely break out karaoke when my friends have birthday parties.
Birthday.author: Josh Groban

Birthday.content: I am 23, the year of the iron birthday, the gate of darkness. I am ill.
Birthday.author: Allen Ginsberg

Birthday.content: I'm not going to be caught around here for any fool celebration. To hell with birthdays!
Birthday.author: Norman Rockwell

Birthday.content: I decided if you're lucky enough to be alive, you should use each birthday to celebrate what your life is about.
Birthday.author: Mary Steenburgen

Birthday.content: New Year's Day is every man's birthday.
Birthday.author: Charles Lamb

Birthday.content: For Tim Burton's birthday I gave him a rainbow beetle. He loved it!
Birthday.author: Eva Green

Birthday.content: Some people won't go the extra mile, and then on their birthday, when no one makes a fuss, they feel neglected and bitter.
Birthday.author: Anne Lamott

Birthday.content: In the Mexican culture, we never miss a baptism, a birthday, a baby shower, a wedding shower, a wedding. You must show up. Otherwise, you'll be in big trouble.
Birthday.author: Eva Longoria

Birthday.content: The only thing better than singing is more singing.
Birthday.author: Ella Fitzgerald

Birthday.content: For my birthday I got a humidifier and a de-humidifier... I put them in the same room and let them fight it out.
Birthday.author: Steven Wright

Birthday.content: A gift, with a kind countenance, is a double present.
Birthday.author: Thomas Fuller

Birthday.content: I kept a diary right after I was born. Day 1: Tired from the move. Day 2: Everyone thinks I'm an idiot.
Birthday.author: Steven Wright

Birthday.content: If you can give your child only one gift, let it be enthusiasm.
Birthday.author: Bruce Barton

Birthday.content: At my age flowers scare me.
Birthday.author: George Burns

Birthday.content: I cried on my 18th birthday. I thought 17 was such a nice age. You're young enough to get away with things, but you're old enough, too.
Birthday.author: Liv Tyler

Birthday.content: When someone asks if you'd like cake or pie, why not say you want cake and pie?
Birthday.author: Lisa Loeb

Birthday.content: I hate birthdays. I thought that I only hated my own birthday, and then I realized that I hate my children's birthdays too.
Birthday.author: Samantha Bee

Birthday.content: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
Birthday.author: Madeleine L'Engle

Birthday.content: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
Birthday.author: Buddy Valastro

Birthday.content: Youth has no age.
Birthday.author: Pablo Picasso

Birthday.content: The best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
Birthday.author: E. Joseph Cossman

Birthday.content: I had a birthday party with my family and friends at a house, and Chipotle catered. It was beautiful.
Birthday.author: Ansel Elgort

Birthday.content: You don't get older, you get better.
Birthday.author: Shirley Bassey

Birthday.content: I love a card. You know, cards? At birthdays? I collect them.
Birthday.author: Adele

Birthday.content: If every year is a marble, how many marbles do you have left? How many sunrises, how many opportunities to rise to the full stature of your being?
Birthday.author: Joy Page

Birthday.content: With my daughter, we do arts and crafts, we read a lot, we listen to music, and we cut the strings off balloons and bounce them around after birthday parties.
Birthday.author: Lisa Loeb

Birthday.content: Most of us can remember a time when a birthday - especially if it was one's own - brightened the world as if a second sun has risen.
Birthday.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

Birthday.content: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
Birthday.author: Audrey Hepburn

Birthday.content: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
Birthday.author: Ausonius

Birthday.content: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
Birthday.author: George Meredith

Birthday.content: Let them eat cake.
Birthday.author: Marie Antoinette

Birthday.content: I like to go to anybody else's birthday, and if I'm invited I'm a good guest. But I never celebrate my birthdays. I really don't care.
Birthday.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

Birthday.content: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words.
Birthday.author: Plautus

Birthday.content: My policy on cake is pro having it and pro eating it.
Birthday.author: Boris Johnson

Birthday.content: When you wake up every day, it's like a new birthday: it's a new chance to be great again and make great decisions.
Birthday.author: Poo Bear

Birthday.content: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
Birthday.author: Voltaire

Birthday.content: All the world is birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much.
Birthday.author: George Harrison

Birthday.content: Love the giver more than the gift.
Birthday.author: Brigham Young

Birthday.content: One of the shocks of a 50th birthday is realizing the fundamental fact that your youth is irrevocably over.
Birthday.author: Marianne Williamson

Birthday.content: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
Birthday.author: Satchel Paige

Birthday.content: A gift consists not in what is done or given, but in the intention of the giver or doer.
Birthday.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Birthday.content: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
Birthday.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Birthday.content: For the youth, the indignation of most things will just surge as each birthday passes.
Birthday.author: Chris Evans

Birthday.content: I like to do special things for people. Any time someone has a birthday, I make them a really special cake that they all seem to love - it's a Coca-Cola cake.
Birthday.author: Kimberly Schlapman

Birthday.content: If there's one thing I really want for my birthday, that is for the mining company not to mine my daddy's reserve.
Birthday.author: Bindi Irwin

Birthday.content: To give somebody your time is the biggest gift you can give.
Birthday.author: Franka Potente

Birthday.content: I like working on my birthday, so I always do.
Birthday.author: Abhishek Bachchan

Birthday.content: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
Birthday.author: Brian Tracy

Birthday.content: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
Birthday.author: Bob Hope

Birthday.content: I grew up on Section 8 housing, food stamps, welfare, and dealing with social services. I never had a Christmas. I never had a birthday.
Birthday.author: Logic

Birthday.content: I'm a very keen baker; I pride myself on my cakes. I go along the classic sponge line, but I like to jazz it up: I've made some psychedelic birthday cakes.
Birthday.author: Greg Rutherford

Birthday.content: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time.
Birthday.author: Jean Paul

Birthday.content: More and more, there are things in my life that I find hard to say. Like, 'David Bowie and Lorde were at my birthday party.' She's a phenomenal spirit.
Birthday.author: Tilda Swinton

Birthday.content: Having studied at the Sorbonne, I spent my 21st birthday in Paris and celebrated with one of my professors in a cafe outside of Notre Dame.
Birthday.author: Joseph Abboud

Birthday.content: The worst part about celebrating another birthday is the shock that you're only as well as you are.
Birthday.author: Anne Lamott

Birthday.content: I was forced to live far beyond my years when just a child, now I have reversed the order and I intend to remain young indefinitely.
Birthday.author: Mary Pickford

Birthday.content: In a bar mitzvah, you do the candle-lighting ceremony with the cake. Every birthday, the cake is the big moment.
Birthday.author: Ron Ben-Israel

Birthday.content: I'm not a big birthday guy; I never have been.
Birthday.author: Lewis Black

Birthday.content: I've never really made a big deal out of my birthday.
Birthday.author: Nikki Reed

Birthday.content: I like spending time with my family and friends on my birthday.
Birthday.author: Prabhas

Birthday.content: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
Birthday.author: Jesse Jackson

Birthday.content: I'm not a birthday person. Maybe because I don't like to build expectations around that one day. You never know how it'll turn out to be.
Birthday.author: Ranbir Kapoor

Birthday.content: I always wanted to shave. It is a very natural process. For my birthday I got a lot of shaving stuff.
Birthday.author: Chaz Bono

Birthday.content: My life is better with every year of living it.
Birthday.author: Rachel Maddow

Birthday.content: Cherish all your happy moments; they make a fine cushion for old age.
Birthday.author: Booth Tarkington

Birthday.content: The way I see it, you should live everyday like its your birthday.
Birthday.author: Paris Hilton

Birthday.content: I binge when I'm happy. When everything is going really well, every day is like I'm at a birthday party.
Birthday.author: Kirstie Alley

Birthday.content: On my birthday, I was in Milan for the collections.
Birthday.author: Eva Herzigova

Birthday.content: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
Birthday.author: Sammy Hagar

Birthday.content: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
Birthday.author: Denis Waitley

Birthday.content: Citizens, thank you for all your birthday wishes. I am 88 years old today and still lucky to live in the greatest city in the world.
Birthday.author: Ed Koch

Birthday.content: It is lovely, when I forget all birthdays, including my own, to find that somebody remembers me.
Birthday.author: Ellen Glasgow

Birthday.content: I like to keep my birthday very relaxed.
Birthday.author: Barun Sobti

Birthday.content: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday but never remembers her age.
Birthday.author: Robert Frost

Birthday.content: Handmade presents are scary because they reveal that you have too much free time.
Birthday.author: Douglas Coupland

Birthday.content: I met Leonardo DiCaprio and Busta Rhymes the same night, on my birthday in New York.
Birthday.author: Jason Mitchell

Birthday.content: Only then, approaching my fortieth birthday, I made philosophy my life's work.
Birthday.author: Karl Jaspers

Birthday.content: You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness.
Birthday.author: Brad Garrett

Birthday.content: I wanted Cathy and Irving to actually say 'I do' and be pronounced husband and wife on Feb. 5, which is my mom's birthday.
Birthday.author: Cathy Guisewite

Birthday.content: A friend never defends a husband who gets his wife an electric skillet for her birthday.
Birthday.author: Erma Bombeck

Birthday.content: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
Birthday.author: Steven Wright

Birthday.content: There are three hundred and sixty-four days when you might get un-birthday presents, and only one for birthday presents, you know.
Birthday.author: Lewis Carroll

Birthday.content: On my fourth or fifth birthday, a guitar was given to me, and I made a new friend. A very loud friend.
Birthday.author: Eliot Sumner

Birthday.content: The day before my 16th birthday I got my guitar.
Birthday.author: Stevie Nicks

Birthday.content: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
Birthday.author: Bernard Baruch

Birthday.content: I can't make eye contact when people sing 'Happy Birthday' to me.
Birthday.author: Dove Cameron

Birthday.content: You know you're getting old when you get that one candle on the cake. It's like, 'See if you can blow this out.'
Birthday.author: Jerry Seinfeld

Birthday.content: Every birthday is a gift. Every day is a gift.
Birthday.author: Aretha Franklin

Birthday.content: I quit high school on my birthday. It was my senior year and I didn't see the point. This was 1962, and I was ready to make music.
Birthday.author: Barry White

Birthday.content: I have 'Happy Birthday' in multiple languages on my iPod - I like to play it at company birthday parties.
Birthday.author: Yigal Azrouel

Birthday.content: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
Birthday.author: Oprah Winfrey

Birthday.content: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn't have one. So I got a cake.
Birthday.author: Mitch Hedberg

Birthday.content: We'll take the cake with the red cherry on top.
Birthday.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

Birthday.content: If I could be doing anything, I'd be laying on the floor in my birthday suit eating junk food and watching something dumb on TV.
Birthday.author: Anita Baker

Birthday.content: Martin Luther King can have his own self-titled birthday recognized as a national holiday, but not our country's first president?
Birthday.author: The Ultimate Warrior

Birthday.content: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
Birthday.author: William Barclay

Birthday.content: My mom and my father's birthday are on the same day.
Birthday.author: Victor Cruz

Birthday.content: I had arranged a birthday party for him and my children, who are all Aquarians. Instead, we got married. I ran out of excuses. It was just us and my children.
Birthday.author: Diane von Furstenberg

Birthday.content: I remember when the candle shop burned down. Everyone stood around singing 'Happy Birthday.'
Birthday.author: Steven Wright

Birthday.content: When I retired from the NFL, my son was born on my birthday two weeks later, which is Valentine's Day. Imagine having a son born on your birthday.
Birthday.author: Jim Kelly

Birthday.content: With my wife I don't get no respect. I made a toast on her birthday to 'the best woman a man ever had.' The waiter joined me.
Birthday.author: Rodney Dangerfield

Faith.content: If you believe in God, He will open the windows of heaven and pour blessings upon you.
Faith.author: Mahalia Jackson

Faith.content: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
Faith.author: Kelly Clarkson

Faith.content: Nothing which is true or beautiful or good makes complete sense in any immediate context of history; therefore we must be saved by faith.
Faith.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

Faith.content: For love would be love of the wrong thing; there is yet faith, But the faith and the love and the hope are all in the waiting.
Faith.author: T. S. Eliot

Faith.content: You must never give up and have faith in yourself.
Faith.author: Luka Modric

Faith.content: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
Faith.author: Mother Teresa

Faith.content: There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds.
Faith.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

Faith.content: You know, my faith is one that admits some doubt.
Faith.author: Barack Obama

Faith.content: The meme for blind faith secures its own perpetuation by the simple unconscious expedient of discouraging rational inquiry.
Faith.author: Richard Dawkins

Faith.content: To insure the adoration of a theorem for any length of time, faith is not enough, a police force is needed as well.
Faith.author: Albert Camus

Faith.content: I slept with faith and found a corpse in my arms on awakening; I drank and danced all night with doubt and found her a virgin in the morning.
Faith.author: Aleister Crowley

Faith.content: God has entrusted us with his most precious treasure - people. He asks us to shepherd and mold them into strong disciples, with brave faith and good character.
Faith.author: John Ortberg

Faith.content: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
Faith.author: Zig Ziglar

Faith.content: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
Faith.author: Erich Fromm

Faith.content: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
Faith.author: Bruce Lee

Faith.content: I would say my poise comes from my faith.
Faith.author: Tua Tagovailoa

Faith.content: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.
Faith.author: C. S. Lewis

Faith.content: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
Faith.author: Saint Augustine

Faith.content: A library implies an act of faith.
Faith.author: Victor Hugo

Faith.content: Unity in faith is theocracy; unity in politics is fascism.
Faith.author: Maajid Nawaz

Faith.content: You can judge the quality of their faith from the way they behave. Discipline is an index to doctrine.
Faith.author: Tertullian

Faith.content: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
Faith.author: Khalil Gibran

Faith.content: My faith and my beliefs sustain me through all of the craziness that this life brings.
Faith.author: Jay DeMarcus

Faith.content: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
Faith.author: Voltaire

Faith.content: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
Faith.author: Joel Osteen

Faith.content: If we were logical, the future would be bleak, indeed. But we are more than logical. We are human beings, and we have faith, and we have hope, and we can work.
Faith.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

Faith.content: Obedience is an act of faith; disobedience is the result of unbelief.
Faith.author: Edwin Louis Cole

Faith.content: In the Church, and in the journey of faith, women have had and still have a special role in opening doors to the Lord.
Faith.author: Pope Francis

Faith.content: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness.
Faith.author: Henry David Thoreau

Faith.content: If there was no faith there would be no living in this world. We could not even eat hash with any safety.
Faith.author: Josh Billings

Faith.content: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.
Faith.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Faith.content: The great moral powers of the soul are faith, hope, and love.
Faith.author: Ellen G. White

Faith.content: True equality means holding everyone accountable in the same way, regardless of race, gender, faith, ethnicity - or political ideology.
Faith.author: Monica Crowley

Faith.content: Choosing an attitude of faith will release peace out of your spirit and into your soul.
Faith.author: Joyce Meyer

Faith.content: I'm a strong man of faith.
Faith.author: Darryl Glenn

Faith.content: He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery!
Faith.author: Anne Frank

Faith.content: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
Faith.author: Joel Osteen

Faith.content: Faith is the first factor in a life devoted to service. Without it, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
Faith.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

Faith.content: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
Faith.author: Helen Keller

Faith.content: There is nothing wrong with America that faith, love of freedom, intelligence, and energy of her citizens cannot cure.
Faith.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

Faith.content: Faith is the sense of life, that sense by virtue of which man does not destroy himself, but continues to live on. It is the force whereby we live.
Faith.author: Leo Tolstoy

Faith.content: Without prayer, without faith in the Almighty, the civil rights movement would have been like a bird without wings.
Faith.author: John Lewis

Faith.content: Faith, mighty faith, the promise sees, And looks to God alone; Laughs at impossibilities, And cries it shall be done.
Faith.author: Charles Wesley

Faith.content: No matter what we face, put your total faith in God, and in time - not our time, but His time - He'll bring us through.
Faith.author: Lex Luger

Faith.content: I was raised to believe in hard work, in faith and family.
Faith.author: Mike Pence

Faith.content: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
Faith.author: Brad Henry

Faith.content: Only our individual faith in freedom can keep us free.
Faith.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

Faith.content: Basically, there are two paths you can walk: faith or fear. It's impossible to simultaneously trust God and not trust God.
Faith.author: Charles Stanley

Faith.content: In a mood of faith and hope my work goes on. A ream of fresh paper lies on my desk waiting for the next book. I am a writer and I take up my pen to write.
Faith.author: Pearl S. Buck

Faith.content: Be patient, work hard and consistently, have faith in your writing, and don't be afraid to listen to constructive criticism.
Faith.author: Jonathan Galassi

Faith.content: Doubt is not the opposite of faith; it is one element of faith.
Faith.author: Paul Tillich

Faith.content: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
Faith.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Faith.content: Anyone who is to find Christ must first find the church. How could anyone know where Christ is and what faith is in him unless he knew where his believers are?
Faith.author: Martin Luther

Faith.content: Sometimes you find your strongest faith in the darkest corners.
Faith.author: Margo Price

Faith.content: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.
Faith.author: Alan Watts

Faith.content: I am satisfied that every man or woman who goes to the temple in a spirit of sincerity and faith leaves the house of the Lord a better man or woman.
Faith.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

Faith.content: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.
Faith.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Faith.content: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
Faith.author: Thomas S. Monson

Faith.content: God never made a promise that was too good to be true.
Faith.author: Dwight L. Moody

Faith.content: A small body of determined spirits fired by an unquenchable faith in their mission can alter the course of history.
Faith.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Faith.content: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
Faith.author: Plato

Faith.content: Man must cease attributing his problems to his environment, and learn again to exercise his will - his personal responsibility in the realm of faith and morals.
Faith.author: Albert Schweitzer

Faith.content: We're on some path that's set since we're born, but I still believe we can change some things. So I believe in my faith, but I still don't believe in my fate.
Faith.author: RM

Faith.content: Doubts may happen. But if you surround yourself with like-minded people who believe in you and who you believe in, and you have faith, all will be well.
Faith.author: Luke James

Faith.content: Only through repentance and faith in Christ can anyone be saved. No religious activity will be sufficient, only true faith in Jesus Christ alone.
Faith.author: Ravi Zacharias

Faith.content: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
Faith.author: Thomas More

Faith.content: The measure of a man is not how great his faith is, but how great his love is. We must not let government programs disconnect our souls from each other.
Faith.author: J. C. Watts

Faith.content: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
Faith.author: Dwight L. Moody

Faith.content: If our faith is the most important part of our lives, then our religious views influence every other part of our lives, including our political views.
Faith.author: Robert Jeffress

Faith.content: Talk unbelief, and you will have unbelief; but talk faith, and you will have faith. According to the seed sown will be the harvest.
Faith.author: Ellen G. White

Faith.content: I have faith in faith. God is there, whether we have faith or not, so why not have faith in him?
Faith.author: Valerie Bertinelli

Faith.content: Without faith, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
Faith.author: Mary McLeod Bethune

Faith.content: It's not a faith in technology. It's faith in people.
Faith.author: Steve Jobs

Faith.content: God, our Creator, has stored within our minds and personalities, great potential strength and ability. Prayer helps us tap and develop these powers.
Faith.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

Faith.content: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.
