Fitness.content: We took advantage of the running boom, which became the jogging boom, which became the fitness boom... and we've benefited from all of that.
Fitness.author: Phil Knight

Fitness.content: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness.
Fitness.author: Elaine MacDonald

Fitness.content: I'm healthy now. I probably wouldn't say I'm at my best fitness level and I haven't played that much lately, but I'm healthy and that's all that matters.
Fitness.author: Mary Pierce

Fitness.content: Don't get hung up on the size. If you feel bad about yourself because a 12 is what fits, take a Sharpie, and write '6' on the label.
Fitness.author: Stacy London

Fitness.content: My morning starts with some form of exercise, and I give two hours - from 5:30 to 7:30 A.M. - to my personal fitness.
Fitness.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

Fitness.content: Number one, like yourself. Number two, you have to eat healthy. And number three, you've got to squeeze your buns. That's my formula.
Fitness.author: Richard Simmons

Fitness.content: On my days off, I like to be outdoors - on my bike or walking the dog or swimming - so it's important anyone I date is also into fitness.
Fitness.author: Mollie King

Fitness.content: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
Fitness.author: John F. Kennedy

Fitness.content: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
Fitness.author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

Fitness.content: I've exercised with women so thin that buzzards followed them to their cars.
Fitness.author: Erma Bombeck

Fitness.content: For fitness, I've just bought a watch which keeps a track of how many calories I burn, what's my heart rate, which is very fascinating.
Fitness.author: Yami Gautam

Fitness.content: I treat health and fitness as looking after myself.
Fitness.author: Iskra Lawrence

Fitness.content: Fitness is not an option. It's part of my job.
Fitness.author: Alison Sweeney

Fitness.content: I have been through various fitness regimes. I used to run about five miles a day and I did aerobics for a while.
Fitness.author: Sting

Fitness.content: Fitness, defending, the mental stuff - those were all weaknesses of mine. And I turned those into strengths.
Fitness.author: Carli Lloyd

Fitness.content: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
Fitness.author: Fred Perry

Fitness.content: Clearly, society has a tremendous stake in insisting on a woman's natural fitness for the career of mother: the alternatives are all too expensive.
Fitness.author: Ann Oakley

Fitness.content: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
Fitness.author: Joseph Addison

Fitness.content: I'm not ashamed to admit that for many years, most of my fitness information came from a VHS series by MTV called ''The Grind Workout.''
Fitness.author: Jenna Wortham

Fitness.content: The fitness builds the foundation for me as an actor to have clarity. Fitness has always been the base of where I start off as a performer.
Fitness.author: Manu Bennett

Fitness.content: I swim like a fish and I have an amazing kick.
Fitness.author: Gordon Ramsay

Fitness.content: I am confident in myself and about my fitness.
Fitness.author: Radamel Falcao

Fitness.content: While I try to keep my fitness regimen consistent, during awards season, I'm especially conscious of what I'll be wearing and plan my workouts accordingly.
Fitness.author: Kate Hudson

Fitness.content: If my Instagram or Twitter has gotten people to try healthy supplements or enjoy a new form of fitness and feel better about themselves, then that's pretty rad.
Fitness.author: Seth Rollins

Fitness.content: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
Fitness.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

Fitness.content: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties.
Fitness.author: Hugh Blair

Fitness.content: What's wrong with extreme dieting and hard-core fitness plans is that they don't take into account the rest of your life.
Fitness.author: Alison Sweeney

Fitness.content: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.
Fitness.author: John F. Kennedy

Fitness.content: Fitness has always been one of the top priorities in my life because that's the way I grew up, with soccer being the sport of choice.
Fitness.author: Ziggy Marley

Fitness.content: Being a dancer is my metaphor for life because you have to know your body. Being a dancer and paying attention to fitness is all about moving in balance.
Fitness.author: Goldie Hawn

Fitness.content: I think a basic level of fitness can help the body cope with all manner of incidents.
Fitness.author: Richard Hammond

Fitness.content: For whatever reason, maybe it's because of my story, but people associate Livestrong with exercise and physical fitness, health and lifestyle choices like that.
Fitness.author: Lance Armstrong

Fitness.content: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be.
Fitness.author: Khloe Kardashian

Fitness.content: Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy.
Fitness.author: Vanessa Hudgens

Fitness.content: I take a more holistic approach to fitness than trying to achieve a certain body to display.
Fitness.author: Farhan Akhtar

Fitness.content: For much of the year, you're just trying to maintain your fitness. It's not often you get a lot of time to really concentrate on improving it.
Fitness.author: Andy Murray

Fitness.content: I was excited 'Maxim' wanted me to be in Expert Fitness.
Fitness.author: Bobby Lashley

Fitness.content: It's so easy to lose your fitness and so hard to gain it back.
Fitness.author: Alex Morgan

Fitness.content: During a packed season, maintaining fitness becomes tough because you can't put too much effort into it. You're constantly monitoring workloads.
Fitness.author: MS Dhoni

Fitness.content: When I started out in the industry, I turned to magazines like 'Flex' and 'Muscle & Fitness' - the people on their covers were my inspiration.
Fitness.author: Phil Heath

Fitness.content: My own preferred fitness regime is to use my bicycle.
Fitness.author: Paul Hollywood

Fitness.content: I thought I did well for someone who has been out for 10 or 11 months. Then I was sub against Liverpool and tried to play for the guys and work on my fitness.
Fitness.author: Paul Gascoigne

Fitness.content: Health is the vital principle of bliss, and exercise, of health.
Fitness.author: James Thomson

Fitness.content: I can work hard and be disciplined like a soldier, but I could never reach their level of fitness.
Fitness.author: Richard C. Armitage

Fitness.content: I've still got a small fitness and conditioning business where I travel round the world doing stuff for individuals and corporations, mainly fitness training.
Fitness.author: Daley Thompson

Fitness.content: The public character of every public servant is legitimate subject of discussion, and his fitness or unfitness for office may be fairly canvassed by any person.
Fitness.author: Charles Babbage

Fitness.content: Beside the brand-ambassador elements of the modern racing driver, the evolution of the athlete has mandated that as drivers, we are very committed to fitness.
Fitness.author: Charlie Kimball

Fitness.content: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
Fitness.author: Thomas Jefferson

Fitness.content: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
Fitness.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

Fitness.content: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
Fitness.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

Fitness.content: My mom was a professional fitness competitor, so I go into the gym with her. I train with my dad and mother. It's embarrassing, because she's really strong.
Fitness.author: Booboo Stewart

Fitness.content: I do not usually follow a rigid fitness regimen, and most of it depends upon what goals I have in my mind.
Fitness.author: Gautam Gambhir

Fitness.content: Health and fitness is who I am. It's what I do.
Fitness.author: Lee Haney

Fitness.content: The only weights I lift are my dogs.
Fitness.author: Olivia Newton-John

Fitness.content: I don't smoke, don't drink much, and go to the gym five times a week. I live a healthy lifestyle and feel great. I can run a marathon, you know.
Fitness.author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

Fitness.content: All we're trying to do is change how people think about fitness. And build Under Armour into the biggest brand in the entire land.
Fitness.author: Kevin Plank

Fitness.content: You can't be fat and fast, too; so lift, run, diet and work.
Fitness.author: Hank Stram

Fitness.content: I tell my sons all the time, 'The most important thing in your life is fitness,' but a lot of fighters go overboard.
Fitness.author: George Foreman

Fitness.content: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
Fitness.author: Gene Tunney

Fitness.content: The only way you can get match fitness is by playing games.
Fitness.author: Aaron Ramsey

Fitness.content: A feeble body weakens the mind.
Fitness.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

Fitness.content: With fitness, I do Bikrams hot yoga. The gym that I have in my building is amazing. I love to do cardio and weights there.
Fitness.author: Shay Mitchell

Fitness.content: Fitness is really important for my mental and emotional equilibrium as well as my physical wellbeing.
Fitness.author: Robert Rinder

Fitness.content: Oh, and once, when I was in the Marines, I got a perfect score on my physical fitness test.
Fitness.author: Drew Carey

Fitness.content: Women have fought so long and hard for our rights and equality, and now all our attention is put on being a size 0.
Fitness.author: Pink

Fitness.content: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
Fitness.author: Sam Snead

Fitness.content: Fitness is important, but the most important thing is how you adapt and the way you feel physically. To adapt to a new position. To try to change your game.
Fitness.author: Fernando Torres

Fitness.content: I eat super healthy and I'm super fit. I dabble in every type of fitness. I have a trainer and I go to the gym. I do yoga as well.
Fitness.author: Linda Evangelista

Fitness.content: I'm not a fitness model; I'm just a singer. If people focus on that, that's what I care about.
Fitness.author: Alessia Cara

Fitness.content: The mind is the most important part of achieving any fitness goal. Mental change always comes before physical change.
Fitness.author: Matt McGorry

Fitness.content: I didn't have the same fitness or ability as the other girls, so I had to beat them with my mind.
Fitness.author: Martina Hingis

Fitness.content: The most important quality in a leader is that of being acknowledged as such. All leaders whose fitness is questioned are clearly lacking in force.
Fitness.author: Andre Maurois

Fitness.content: For me, fitness is not just about hitting the gym; it is also about an inner happiness and an overall well-being.
Fitness.author: Rakul Preet Singh

Fitness.content: My fitness instructor helped me with strength training, muscle building, and toning.
Fitness.author: Karan Patel

Fitness.content: Fitness helps me think better, feel better, and move better.
Fitness.author: Jason Winston George

Fitness.content: I never stop working when I'm on stage, and that's my fitness.
Fitness.author: Jessie J

Fitness.content: I'm really into fitness, so my hobbies are yoga, Pilates, and working out.
Fitness.author: Charlotte McKinney

Fitness.content: I am pleased with the fitness that I have.
Fitness.author: Lin Dan

Fitness.content: I don't lift weights. I do fitness exercises to stay strong.
Fitness.author: Chad le Clos

Fitness.content: I'm doing four hours of gymnastics training a day, six days a week and then an extra two to three hours in a fitness center as well.
Fitness.author: Shawn Johnson

Fitness.content: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.
Fitness.author: Knute Nelson

Fitness.content: Because I take care of my body, it doesn't look like the body of a woman of my years.
Fitness.author: Gloria Swanson

Fitness.content: I have a tremendous passion for fitness, I love challenges and I am a very driven guy.
Fitness.author: Lou Ferrigno

Fitness.content: I don t have a scale; I'm not big on measurements. Until a person looks in the mirror and is happy with themselves, you have not reached your fitness goals.
Fitness.author: Gunnar Peterson

Fitness.content: I try and maintain a little bit of fitness, man.
Fitness.author: Frank Bruno

Fitness.content: Parentage is a very important profession, but no test of fitness for it is ever imposed in the interest of the children.
Fitness.author: George Bernard Shaw

Fitness.content: I've been into exercise my whole life, been a runner and been into health and fitness always.
Fitness.author: Sissy Spacek

Fitness.content: Don't get me wrong, I think bikes are terrific. I own several of my own, including a trendy mountain style, and ride them for pleasure and light exercise.
Fitness.author: Brock Yates

Fitness.content: We spend millions on fitness each year, yet we seem to get fatter.
Fitness.author: Mary Pilon

Fitness.content: No one's ever achieved financial fitness with a January resolution that's abandoned by February.
Fitness.author: Suze Orman

Fitness.content: Fitness is a luxury when you are busy!
Fitness.author: Lauren Conrad

Fitness.content: I can't promote fitness tea for the rest of my life.
Fitness.author: Karrueche Tran

Fitness.content: I have never taken any exercise, except sleeping and resting, and I never intend to take any.
Fitness.author: Mark Twain

Fitness.content: I try and groom myself, be it through fitness or dance.
Fitness.author: Yami Gautam

Fitness.content: You can always improve your fitness if you keep training.
Fitness.author: Pastor Maldonado

Fitness.content: I'll be a diehard bodybuilder until my last breath, but I want my brand and the movement we are creating to touch all aspect of the fitness community.
Fitness.author: Ronnie Coleman

Fitness.content: I attend to my fitness. I go the gym every day and try to maintain my physical fitness; without that, it is tough to take challenges on the chess board.
Fitness.author: Viswanathan Anand

Fitness.content: I'm enjoying myself this year and for once I'm not chasing my fitness.
Fitness.author: Jamie Redknapp

Fitness.content: The only way for a rich man to be healthy is by exercise and abstinence, to live as if he were poor.
Fitness.author: William Temple

Fitness.content: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
Fitness.author: Emil Zatopek

Fitness.content: Exercise is done against one's wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
Fitness.author: George A. Sheehan

Fitness.content: I train Monday through Saturday. I usually have fitness training for 90 minutes, then I'm on the tennis court for 3 to 4 hours.
Fitness.author: Sloane Stephens

Fitness.content: So I've broadened the fitness concept to make it one of moderation and balance.
Fitness.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

Fitness.content: Personally, I need a high level of physical fitness in order to feel at ease.
Fitness.author: Jurgen Klinsmann

Fitness.content: I don't want to lose my fitness. I'm 45. I have two babies. I've got a long way to go and I want to keep in tiptop shape. There's no magic bullet.
Fitness.author: Marcia Cross

Friendship.content: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
Friendship.author: Confucius

Friendship.content: All I required to be happy was friendship and people I could admire.
Friendship.author: Christian Dior

Friendship.content: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, Can never know what true friendship means.
Friendship.author: Charles Kingsley

Friendship.content: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
Friendship.author: Henry Ward Beecher

Friendship.content: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
Friendship.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

Friendship.content: Love, friendship, networking - these are all critical connections and the foundation of a healthy, happy life.
Friendship.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

Friendship.content: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.
Friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard

Friendship.content: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.
Friendship.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

Friendship.content: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life.
Friendship.author: George Herbert

Friendship.content: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
Friendship.author: Oscar Wilde

Friendship.content: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.
Friendship.author: Khalil Gibran

Friendship.content: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
Friendship.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

Friendship.content: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
Friendship.author: John Leonard

Friendship.content: The enemies cannot destroy the king who has at his service the respect and friendship of the wise men who can find fault, disagree, and correct him.
Friendship.author: Thiruvalluvar

Friendship.content: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.
Friendship.author: Dag Hammarskjold

Friendship.content: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
Friendship.author: Alice Walker

Friendship.content: Every friendship is different because everyone's personality is different.
Friendship.author: Nargis Fakhri

Friendship.content: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of one's self, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
Friendship.author: Joseph Addison

Friendship.content: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it.
Friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson

Friendship.content: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.
Friendship.author: Oscar Wilde

Friendship.content: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
Friendship.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

Friendship.content: Friendship is accepting a person with all their qualities - good and bad.
Friendship.author: Mohanlal

Friendship.content: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
Friendship.author: Jean de La Fontaine

Friendship.content: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.
Friendship.author: Saint Basil

Friendship.content: True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.
Friendship.author: George Washington

Friendship.content: There are no shortcuts to genuine friendship. Relationships are built over time.
Friendship.author: Rachel Simmons

Friendship.content: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
Friendship.author: Socrates

Friendship.content: Sustaining true friendship is a lot more challenging than we give it credit for.
Friendship.author: Mariella Frostrup

Friendship.content: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
Friendship.author: Aristotle

Friendship.content: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth.
Friendship.author: Charles Darwin

Friendship.content: I have long enjoyed the friendship and companionship of Republicans because I am by instinct a teacher, and I would like to teach them something.
Friendship.author: Woodrow Wilson

Friendship.content: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
Friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard

Friendship.content: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
Friendship.author: Walt Whitman

Friendship.content: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
Friendship.author: Christie Brinkley

Friendship.content: Value your friendship. Value your relationships.
Friendship.author: Barbara Bush

Friendship.content: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
Friendship.author: Virginia Woolf

Friendship.content: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
Friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau

Friendship.content: But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.
Friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson

Friendship.content: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
Friendship.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Friendship.content: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
Friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau

Friendship.content: People come in and out of our lives, and the true test of friendship is whether you can pick back up right where you left off the last time you saw each other.
Friendship.author: Lisa See

Friendship.content: Advocating for yourself in the context of friendship starts with choosing the right people to be part of your inner circle.
Friendship.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

Friendship.content: A friend to all is a friend to none.
Friendship.author: Aristotle

Friendship.content: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.
Friendship.author: George Washington

Friendship.content: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
Friendship.author: Henry Ford

Friendship.content: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
Friendship.author: Jim Morrison

Friendship.content: A true friend freely, advises justly, assists readily, adventures boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
Friendship.author: William Penn

Friendship.content: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
Friendship.author: Charles Caleb Colton

Friendship.content: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
Friendship.author: Euripides

Friendship.content: There is no friendship in trade.
Friendship.author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

Friendship.content: If instead of a gem, or even a flower, we should cast the gift of a loving thought into the heart of a friend, that would be giving as the angels give.
Friendship.author: George MacDonald

Friendship.content: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
Friendship.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

Friendship.content: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
Friendship.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

Friendship.content: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
Friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas

Friendship.content: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
Friendship.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Friendship.content: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.
Friendship.author: Simone de Beauvoir

Friendship.content: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
Friendship.author: George Washington

Friendship.content: To embrace the whole world in friendship is wisdom. This wisdom is not changeable like the flowers that bloom and fade.
Friendship.author: Thiruvalluvar

Friendship.content: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights.
Friendship.author: Giotto di Bondone

Friendship.content: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.
Friendship.author: Chanakya

Friendship.content: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
Friendship.author: Henry Van Dyke

Friendship.content: A man's growth is seen in the successive choirs of his friends.
Friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Friendship.content: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?
Friendship.author: Abraham Lincoln

Friendship.content: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
Friendship.author: Herodotus

Friendship.content: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated.
Friendship.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Friendship.content: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.
Friendship.author: Epicurus

Friendship.content: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.
Friendship.author: William Butler Yeats

Friendship.content: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed.
Friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Friendship.content: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
Friendship.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

Friendship.content: Friendship is the complete explanation of what a Cheetah Girl is - if you have that true friendship, you can conquer anything you want.
Friendship.author: Sabrina Bryan

Friendship.content: The differences between friends cannot but reinforce their friendship.
Friendship.author: Mao Zedong

Friendship.content: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
Friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Friendship.content: I have learned that friendship isn't about who you've known the longest, it's about who came and never left your side.
Friendship.author: Yolanda Hadid

Friendship.content: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
Friendship.author: Orson Welles

Friendship.content: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.
Friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas

Friendship.content: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.
Friendship.author: Albert Camus

Friendship.content: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses.
Friendship.author: David Storey

Friendship.content: The most important thing for me is to have real friendship between Egyptians and Americans.
Friendship.author: Mohammed Morsi

Friendship.content: Real friendship, like real poetry, is extremely rare - and precious as a pearl.
Friendship.author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

Friendship.content: The love that comes from friendship is the underlying facet of a happy life.
Friendship.author: Chelsea Handler

Friendship.content: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
Friendship.author: Washington Irving

Friendship.content: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks.
Friendship.author: St. Jerome

Friendship.content: Friendship is held to be the severest test of character. It is easy, we think, to be loyal to a family and clan, whose blood is in your own veins.
Friendship.author: Charles Eastman

Friendship.content: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.
Friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Friendship.content: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
Friendship.author: Anais Nin

Friendship.content: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
Friendship.author: Muhammad Ali

Friendship.content: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
Friendship.author: Jane Austen

Friendship.content: I never considered a difference of opinion in politics, in religion, in philosophy, as cause for withdrawing from a friend.
Friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson

Friendship.content: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
Friendship.author: Bill Watterson

Friendship.content: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
Friendship.author: St. Jerome

Friendship.content: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.
Friendship.author: Herman Melville

Friendship.content: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
Friendship.author: Khalil Gibran

Friendship.content: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
Friendship.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

Friendship.content: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
Friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau

Friendship.content: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
Friendship.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

Friendship.content: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.
Friendship.author: Oscar Wilde

Friendship.content: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
Friendship.author: Richard Burton

Friendship.content: Friendship is essentially a partnership.
Friendship.author: Aristotle

Friendship.content: Fan the sinking flame of hilarity with the wing of friendship; and pass the rosy wine.
Friendship.author: Charles Dickens

Friendship.content: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
Friendship.author: Mencius

Friendship.content: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
Friendship.author: Jean de La Fontaine

Friendship.content: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
Friendship.author: Khalil Gibran

Friendship.content: A friend is an emotional bond, just like friendship is a human experience.
Friendship.author: Simon Sinek

Friendship.content: A woman may very well form a friendship with a man, but for this to endure, it must be assisted by a little physical antipathy.
Friendship.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Friendship.content: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
Friendship.author: Margaret Walker

Friendship.content: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.
Friendship.author: Maria Shriver

Friendship.content: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness.
Friendship.author: Chanakya

Friendship.content: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
Friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Friendship.content: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
Friendship.author: Robert Southey

Friendship.content: We must reach out our hand in friendship and dignity both to those who would befriend us and those who would be our enemy.
Friendship.author: Arthur Ashe

Friendship.content: Success always necessitates a degree of ruthlessness. Given the choice of friendship or success, I'd probably choose success.
Friendship.author: Sting

Friendship.content: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.
Friendship.author: Ernie Banks

Friendship.content: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance.
Friendship.author: Rabindranath Tagore

Friendship.content: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
Friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Friendship.content: Friendship without self-interest is one of the rare and beautiful things of life.
Friendship.author: James F. Byrnes

Friendship.content: Love is friendship set on fire.
Friendship.author: Jeremy Taylor

Friendship.content: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.
Friendship.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

Friendship.content: Friendship is a wildly underrated medication.
Friendship.author: Anna Deavere Smith

Friendship.content: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
Friendship.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Friendship.content: Yes'm, old friends is always best, 'less you can catch a new one that's fit to make an old one out of.
Friendship.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

Friendship.content: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
Friendship.author: Baltasar Gracian

Friendship.content: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
Friendship.author: Mencius

Friendship.content: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
Friendship.author: Marcel Proust

Friendship.content: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
Friendship.author: Henry David Thoreau

Friendship.content: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
Friendship.author: Unknown

Friendship.content: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
Friendship.author: Helen Keller

Friendship.content: The greatest sweetener of human life is Friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.
Friendship.author: Joseph Addison

Friendship.content: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something.
Friendship.author: Anton Chekhov

Friendship.content: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
Friendship.author: Doug Larson

Friendship.content: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.
Friendship.author: George Foreman

Friendship.content: The friendship we share grows amidst the craggy rock pond; reeds of water spray fireflies scented with bonfires.
Friendship.author: Bradley Chicho

Friendship.content: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.
Friendship.author: Thomas Jefferson

Friendship.content: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
Friendship.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Friendship.content: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
Friendship.author: Plutarch

Friendship.content: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
Friendship.author: Oprah Winfrey

Friendship.content: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?
Friendship.author: Dalai Lama

Friendship.content: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
Friendship.author: C. S. Lewis

Friendship.content: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.
Friendship.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

Friendship.content: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
Friendship.author: Confucius

Friendship.content: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.
Friendship.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

Friendship.content: Longevity in friendship is very important and one of the keys to the foundation of a happy life.
Friendship.author: Karrueche Tran

Friendship.content: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
Friendship.author: Thomas Fuller

Friendship.content: As soon as you try to describe a close friendship, it loses something.
Friendship.author: Dean Smith

Friendship.content: He who hath many friends hath none.
Friendship.author: Aristotle

Friendship.content: The feeling of friendship is like that of being comfortably filled with roast beef; love, like being enlivened with champagne.
Friendship.author: Samuel Johnson

Friendship.content: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
Friendship.author: Elie Wiesel

Friendship.content: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
Friendship.author: Arnold H. Glasow

Friendship.content: Football is about sacrifice, dedication, a lot of work, and friendship off the pitch.
Friendship.author: Edinson Cavani

Friendship.content: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
Friendship.author: John Webster

Friendship.content: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
Friendship.author: William Blake

Friendship.content: I know, firsthand, that soccer brings people together - all it takes is a ball and a few people, and the seeds of friendship are planted.
Friendship.author: Ali Krieger

Friendship.content: Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece. Help others. Drink deeply from good books. Make friendship a fine art. Build a shelter against a rainy day.
Friendship.author: John Wooden

Friendship.content: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
Friendship.author: Walter Winchell

Friendship.content: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
Friendship.author: Len Wein

Friendship.content: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.
Friendship.author: Leo Buscaglia

Friendship.content: Opposition is true friendship.
Friendship.author: William Blake

Friendship.content: An excellent man; he has no enemies; and none of his friends like him.
Friendship.author: Oscar Wilde

God.content: Where can we go to find God if we cannot see Him in our own hearts and in every living being.
God.author: Swami Vivekananda

God.content: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
God.author: Josie Loren

God.content: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
God.author: John Wooden

God.content: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.
God.author: Lil Wayne

God.content: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
God.author: William Shakespeare

God.content: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.
God.author: Henry David Thoreau

God.content: My dad said, 'Stay humble, and you gotta work harder than everybody else.' My mom said, 'Always be yourself.' She always told me only God can judge me.
God.author: Nate Robinson

God.content: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
God.author: Swami Vivekananda

God.content: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified, and God will be in them.
God.author: Swami Vivekananda

God.content: The meaning of life. The wasted years of life. The poor choices of life. God answers the mess of life with one word: 'grace.'
God.author: Max Lucado

God.content: Let God's grace be the mosque, and devotion the prayer mat. Let the Quran be the good conduct.
God.author: Guru Nanak

God.content: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
God.author: Soren Kierkegaard

God.content: Dog is God spelled backward.
God.author: Duane Chapman

God.content: Prayer is talking with God. God knows your heart and is not so concerned with your words as He is with the attitude of your heart.
God.author: Josh McDowell

God.content: I can find God in nature, in animals, in birds and the environment.
God.author: Pat Buckley

God.content: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
God.author: Jesus Christ

God.content: The word 'Islam' means 'peace.' The word 'Muslim' means 'one who surrenders to God.' But the press makes us seem like haters.
God.author: Muhammad Ali

God.content: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'
God.author: Bill Maher

God.content: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.
God.author: Erma Bombeck

God.content: The idea that an individual can find God is terribly self-centered. It is like a wave thinking it can find the sea.
God.author: John Templeton

God.content: I just thank God that I didn't grow up with so much money or privilege because you had to create ways to make it happen.
God.author: Kim Basinger

God.content: Be brave and be fearless, and for God's sake, stand up for yourself.
God.author: Gretchen Carlson

God.content: Anyone can count the seeds in an apple, but only God can count the number of apples in a seed.
God.author: Robert H. Schuller

God.content: If you want to be original just try being yourself, because God has never made two people exactly alike.
God.author: Bernard Meltzer

God.content: All things are artificial, for nature is the art of God.
God.author: Thomas Browne

God.content: We cannot embrace God's forgiveness if we are so busy clinging to past wounds and nursing old grudges.
God.author: T. D. Jakes

God.content: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
God.author: George S. Patton

God.content: Every morning that I wake up and I'm breathing, I can feel it and take a moment to say, you know, 'Thank God I'm alive for another day.'
God.author: Ron Cephas Jones

God.content: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
God.author: Ben Carson

God.content: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
God.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

God.content: If you are caught on a golf course during a storm and are afraid of lightning, hold up a 1-iron. Not even God can hit a 1-iron.
God.author: Lee Trevino

God.content: An angel of God never has wings.
God.author: Joseph Smith, Jr.

God.content: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
God.author: Voltaire

God.content: God may be in the details, but the goddess is in the questions. Once we begin to ask them, there's no turning back.
God.author: Gloria Steinem

God.content: I'm always happy for people when I see God blessing them the way he's blessed me.
God.author: Ruben Studdard

God.content: The strong creation created by God in the world is not the lion, not the elephant, not the tiger - the girl.
God.author: Arunachalam Muruganantham

God.content: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
God.author: Joel Osteen

God.content: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
God.author: Saint Augustine

God.content: I know that there's a god because I was able to survive everything that I've been through - all of the tough times - and I'm still at the top of my game.
God.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

God.content: I will thank God for the day and the moment I have.
God.author: Jim Valvano

God.content: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.
God.author: DMX

God.content: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
God.author: Prince

God.content: Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks.
God.author: Regina Brett

God.content: I would rather die than do something which I know to be a sin, or to be against God's will.
God.author: Joan of Arc

God.content: I am a poor man and of little worth, who is laboring in that art that God has given me in order to extend my life as long as possible.
God.author: Michelangelo

God.content: I believe that God has blessed me in immeasurable ways so that I can, in return, bless and help others.
God.author: Karen Civil

God.content: Stupidity is also a gift of God, but one mustn't misuse it.
God.author: Pope John Paul II

God.content: God has entrusted us with his most precious treasure - people. He asks us to shepherd and mold them into strong disciples, with brave faith and good character.
God.author: John Ortberg

God.content: I am an angel. I was sent here from God to heal.
God.author: Kevin Hart

God.content: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children.
God.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

God.content: Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God.
God.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

God.content: I may not be where I want to be, but thank God I am not where I used to be.
God.author: Joyce Meyer

God.content: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
God.author: Joan Rivers

God.content: If you have men who will exclude any of God's creatures from the shelter of compassion and pity, you will have men who will deal likewise with their fellow men.
God.author: Francis of Assisi

God.content: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers.
God.author: Rudyard Kipling

God.content: So I would say God hates war, but God loves every soldier.
God.author: Rick Warren

God.content: Being out there in the ocean, God's creation, it's like a gift He has given us to enjoy.
God.author: Bethany Hamilton

God.content: Do your best and leave the rest to God.
God.author: Manisha Koirala

God.content: The only thing that ultimately matters is to eat an ice-cream cone, play a slide trombone, plant a small tree, good God, now you're free.
God.author: Ray Manzarek

God.content: Fishing keeps you alive, gives you time away - to enjoy God, the creations that He made. Because God made you.
God.author: Roy Jones Jr.

God.content: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
God.author: Thomas Fuller

God.content: If God listened to the prayers of men, all men would quickly have perished: for they are forever praying for evil against one another.
God.author: Epicurus

God.content: You see, God helps only people who work hard. That principle is very clear.
God.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

God.content: God, our Creator, has stored within our minds and personalities, great potential strength and ability. Prayer helps us tap and develop these powers.
God.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

God.content: Prayer is the most concrete way to make our home in God.
God.author: Henri Nouwen

God.content: God will not look you over for medals degrees or diplomas, but for scars.
God.author: Elbert Hubbard

God.content: I walk in a space of gratitude. I'm so grateful to God for blessing me with an amazing family and the opportunity to do what I love.
God.author: Jurnee Smollett-Bell

God.content: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
God.author: C. S. Lewis

God.content: Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time.
God.author: Oswald Chambers

God.content: Just be yourself, and enjoy the blessings that God's borne out on you.
God.author: Delilah

God.content: Each angel that God created was in himself a masterpiece. Each one possessed his own degree of intelligence and his own beauty.
God.author: Mother Angelica

God.content: Life as we know it, with all its ups and downs, will soon be over. We all will give an accounting to God of how we have lived.
God.author: William Wilberforce

God.content: The most important thing is God's blessing and if you believe in God and you believe in yourself, you have nothing to worry about.
God.author: Mohamed Al-Fayed

God.content: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
God.author: Mencius

God.content: God is good for everybody. The sun shines on good people and bad people, and it rains on both, too. God doesn't choose rain only for bad people.
God.author: Mariano Rivera

God.content: My native land is a slave of heathenism, men's god is their belly, and they live only for the present. The richer a man, the holier.
God.author: St. Jerome

God.content: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family.
God.author: Coy Bowles

God.content: God has blessed me on a lot of levels. Have I worked for it? Absolutely. But it still takes that blessing.
God.author: Diamond Dallas Page

God.content: I like smoking! I mean, God, I quit everything else, can't I smoke?
God.author: Melanie Griffith

God.content: Before I go to bed, I thank God for blessing me with all the things he blessed me with, and for my family to be safe.
God.author: Lauren Alaina

God.content: Let go of yesterday. Let today be a new beginning and be the best that you can, and you'll get to where God wants you to be.
God.author: Joel Osteen

God.content: My religion is based on truth and non-violence. Truth is my God. Non-violence is the means of realising Him.
God.author: Mahatma Gandhi

God.content: To gather with God's people in united adoration of the Father is as necessary to the Christian life as prayer.
God.author: Martin Luther

God.content: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
God.author: Socrates

God.content: I thank God for my failures. Maybe not at the time but after some reflection. I never feel like a failure just because something I tried has failed.
God.author: Dolly Parton

God.content: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
God.author: Lil' Kim

God.content: My God... What are the headlines going to be like on Monday if the Yankees don't make the playoffs?
God.author: Wade Boggs

God.content: Without your health, you've got nothing going on. I thank God every day for good health.
God.author: Ric Flair

God.content: Keep your nose out the sky, keep your heart to god, and keep your face to the raising sun.
God.author: Kanye West

God.content: Honesty is of God and dishonesty of the devil; the devil was a liar from the beginning.
God.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

God.content: Sometimes God will deliver you from the fire, and other times God will make you fireproof.
God.author: Joel Osteen

God.content: When I go to bed at night, I ask God to give me another day; I ask him to keep me strong and make me a good teacher and to keep spreading this right word.
God.author: Richard Simmons

God.content: I feel I am lucky. I am grateful for this life that God has given me. I am happy, as I am getting to do work that I want to do and enjoy doing it.
God.author: Sonam Kapoor

God.content: I feel like God has blessed me so much already, and he keeps continuing to bless me.
God.author: Odell Beckham, Jr.

God.content: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god.
God.author: Francis Bacon

God.content: We were born to die and we die to live. As seedlings of God, we barely blossom on earth; we fully flower in heaven.
God.author: Russell M. Nelson

God.content: God has cared for these trees, saved them from drought, disease, avalanches, and a thousand tempests and floods. But he cannot save them from fools.
God.author: John Muir

God.content: Ignorance is the curse of God; knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
God.author: William Shakespeare

God.content: God Almighty first planted a garden. And indeed, it is the purest of human pleasures.
God.author: Francis Bacon

God.content: One of the great lessons the fall of the leaf teaches, is this: do your work well and then be ready to depart when God shall call.
God.author: Tryon Edwards

God.content: Healing rain is a real touch from God. It could be physical healing or emotional or whatever.
God.author: Michael W. Smith

God.content: Prayer doesn't just change things - it changes us. If we are diligent in seeking God, slowly and surely we become better people.
God.author: Joyce Meyer

God.content: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
God.author: Martin Luther

God.content: I believe in one power, and that is the hand of God. I respect all religions.
God.author: Lata Mangeshkar

God.content: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
God.author: Joel Osteen

God.content: We failed, but in the good providence of God apparent failure often proves a blessing.
God.author: Robert E. Lee

God.content: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
God.author: Will Smith

God.content: For me the goddess is the female of God, She is powerful if different.
God.author: Tina Turner

God.content: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life.
God.author: Robert Baden-Powell

God.content: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
God.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

God.content: From my point of view, God is the light that illuminates the darkness, even if it does not dissolve it, and a spark of divine light is within each of us.
God.author: Pope Francis

God.content: First, I have to thank God for giving me the gift that he did as well as a second chance for a better life.
God.author: Oksana Baiul

God.content: Choose to be kind. Choose to forgive. Let your love grow and shine so that people may look at the example of your life and glorify God in Heaven.
God.author: Victoria Osteen

God.content: Oh, these vast, calm, measureless mountain days, days in whose light everything seems equally divine, opening a thousand windows to show us God.
God.author: John Muir

God.content: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
God.author: Leo Buscaglia

God.content: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, 'I love you.'
God.author: Billy Graham

God.content: Prayer is simply a two-way conversation between you and God.
God.author: Billy Graham

God.content: Those who persevere in sin are those who are held in abhorrence by God, but those who abandon the ways of sin are loved by the Lord.
God.author: St. Jerome

God.content: If I am not, may God put me there; and if I am, may God so keep me.
God.author: Joan of Arc

God.content: If we ever forget that we are One Nation Under God, then we will be a nation gone under.
God.author: Ronald Reagan

God.content: A dark cloud is no sign that the sun has lost his light; and dark black convictions are no arguments that God has laid aside His mercy.
God.author: Charles Spurgeon

God.content: The world has changed and it's going to keep changing, but God never changes; so we are safe when we cling to Him.
God.author: Charles R. Swindoll

God.content: God's mercy and grace give me hope - for myself, and for our world.
God.author: Billy Graham

God.content: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
God.author: Bonnie Tyler

God.content: Is man one of God's blunders? Or is God one of man's blunders?
God.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Indep.content: Work is about more than making a living, as vital as that is. It's fundamental to human dignity, to our sense of self-worth as useful, independent, free people.
Indep.author: William J. Clinton

Indep.content: My mom has made it possible for me to be who I am. Our family is everything. Her greatest skill was encouraging me to find my own person and own independence.
Indep.author: Charlize Theron

Indep.content: What is it that makes us trust our judges? Their independence in office and manner of appointment.
Indep.author: John Marshall

Indep.content: The world is independent of my will.
Indep.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

Indep.content: It's so important to have that independence. You know it yourself: Everyone needs evenings of their own.
Indep.author: Olivia Wilde

Indep.content: I know of no country in which there is so little independence of mind and real freedom of discussion as in America.
Indep.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

Indep.content: At the bottom of education, at the bottom of politics, even at the bottom of religion, there must be for our race economic independence.
Indep.author: Booker T. Washington

Indep.content: The new electronic independence re-creates the world in the image of a global village.
Indep.author: Marshall McLuhan

Indep.content: 'The White Woman on the Green Bicycle' is a love story mapped onto an unfolding political tragedy: that of the failure of the Independence era in Trinidad.
Indep.author: Monique Roffey

Indep.content: It was by one Union that we achieved our independence and liberties, and by it alone can they be maintained.
Indep.author: James Monroe

Indep.content: I remember that during the period leading up to independence in Angola in 1975, I was the only correspondent there at all for three months.
Indep.author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

Indep.content: I admire the courage and self-reliance it takes to start your own business and make it succeed.
Indep.author: Martha Stewart

Indep.content: The Arab Spring reminds me a bit of the decolonisation process where one country gets independence, and everybody else wants it.
Indep.author: Kofi Annan

Indep.content: There is no more independence in politics than there is in jail.
Indep.author: Will Rogers

Indep.content: Independence did not mean chauvinism and narrow nationalism.
Indep.author: Said Musa

Indep.content: In the United States today, the Declaration of Independence hangs on schoolroom walls, but foreign policy follows Machiavelli.
Indep.author: Howard Zinn

Indep.content: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes.
Indep.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Indep.content: I was born with a fierce need for independence.
Indep.author: Michelle Williams

Indep.content: Solitude is independence.
Indep.author: Hermann Hesse

Indep.content: Independence is doing what you want to do, knowing that you're happy with the decisions you're making and that it's the best for you.
Indep.author: Jorja Smith

Indep.content: Men say they love independence in a woman, but they don't waste a second demolishing it brick by brick.
Indep.author: Candice Bergen

Indep.content: Nature has never read the Declaration of Independence. It continues to make us unequal.
Indep.author: Will Durant

Indep.content: The alternative to independence is decline, because the relationship with the Spanish state is not good; everyone knows that.
Indep.author: Carles Puigdemont

Indep.content: The morals of yesterday are no more. They are as dead as the day they were lived. Economic independence has put woman on exactly the same footing as man.
Indep.author: Norma Shearer

Indep.content: A free and truly independent press - fiercely independent when necessary - is the red beating heart of freedom and democracy.
Indep.author: Dan Rather

Indep.content: The love of independence and dislike of unjust treatment is the source of a thousand virtues.
Indep.author: William Godwin

Indep.content: Impatience is the mark of independence, not of bondage.
Indep.author: Marianne Moore

Indep.content: The Declaration of Independence I always considered as a theatrical show. Jefferson ran away with all the stage effect of that... and all the glory of it.
Indep.author: John Adams

Indep.content: Nationality is the miracle of political independence; race is the principle of physical analogy.
Indep.author: Benjamin Disraeli

Indep.content: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
Indep.author: James Cash Penney

Indep.content: It is my living sentiment, and by the blessing of God it shall be my dying sentiment, independence now and independence forever.
Indep.author: Daniel Webster

Indep.content: What you get free costs too much.
Indep.author: Jean Anouilh

Indep.content: When women hold off from marrying men, we call it independence. When men hold off from marrying women, we call it fear of commitment.
Indep.author: Warren Farrell

Indep.content: Great research universities must insist on independence from government and on the exercise of academic freedom.
Indep.author: Alan Dershowitz

Indep.content: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me; I am a free human being with an independent will.
Indep.author: Charlotte Bronte

Indep.content: International law says people fighting for self-determination can use force in order to achieve their independence.
Indep.author: Norman Finkelstein

Indep.content: Part of your heritage in this society is the opportunity to become financially independent.

Indep.content: India helped Bangladesh to achieve independence. The Bangladeshis should remain happy inside the territory of their own country.

Indep.content: Independence doesn't mean you decide the way you want.

Indep.content: The class of citizens who provide at once their own food and their own raiment, may be viewed as the most truly independent and happy.

Indep.content: Independence is happiness.

Indep.content: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.

Indep.content: The United Nations is designed to make possible lasting freedom and independence for all its members.
Indep.author: Harry S Truman

Indep.content: Mad, adj. Affected with a high degree of intellectual independence.
Indep.author: Ambrose Bierce

Indep.content: There are beautiful words in the Bible and in our pledges and the Declaration of Independence.

Indep.content: The skills you need to fight the colonial power and the skills you need to gain independence are not necessarily the same you need to run a country.

Indep.content: Charity is injurious unless it helps the recipient to become independent of it.

Indep.content: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves.

Indep.content: Injustice in the end produces independence.

Indep.content: Self-determination could mean independence, confederacy, federal and autonomy.

Learning.content: Learning to shoot firearms to me is a little like driving stick - it seems like a decent skill to have.
Learning.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

Learning.content: I want to keep learning, keep exploring, keep doing more.
Learning.author: Jessye Norman

Learning.content: I'm learning to deal with my loneliness because then nobody can muck me around any more.

Learning.content: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.

Learning.content: The world is the true classroom. The most rewarding and important type of learning is through experience, seeing something with our own eyes.
Learning.author: Jack Hanna

Learning.content: A little learning is a dangerous thing; Drink deep, or taste not the Pierian spring.
Learning.author: Alexander Pope

Learning.content: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Learning.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Learning.content: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks, And all the sweet serenity of books.
Learning.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

Learning.content: The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.

Learning.content: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.

Learning.content: Life is like playing a violin solo in public and learning the instrument as one goes on.

Learning.content: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?

Learning.content: A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.

Learning.content: I see travelling as a great learning process, and my biggest dream is to travel the world.

Learning.content: I'd rather learn from one bird how to sing than teach ten thousand stars how not to dance.

Learning.content: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.

Learning.content: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.

Learning.content: We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.

Learning.content: Education is what remains after one has forgotten what one has learned in school.

Learning.content: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.

Learning.content: Deliverance is about what I went through the first time. And I chalk it up as a learning experience.

Learning.content: I think I've been able to find happiness, and I've learned to love myself. That's a huge accomplishment for anyone, learning to love yourself.

Learning.content: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.

Learning.content: Rejection is a common occurrence. Learning that early and often will help you build up the tolerance and resistance to keep going and keep trying.

Learning.content: I am learning that in life it is OK to travel in darkness, not knowing what your next move is.

Learning.content: You cannot open a book without learning something.

Learning.content: Intelligence is what you use when you don't know what to do: when neither innateness nor learning has prepared you for the particular situation.

Learning.content: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.

Learning.content: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.

Learning.content: As I'm getting older, I'm really learning unconditional love and loyalty are extremely important.

Learning.content: The beautiful thing about learning is nobody can take it away from you.

Learning.content: I feel I have learnt a lot on the sets of 'Beyond The Clouds,' and it will be a life-long learning for me.

Learning.content: Wisdom has never made a bigot, but learning has.

Learning.content: You're never too old to start learning, and you're never too young to aim high and achieve great things.

Learning.content: Research is creating new knowledge.
Learning.author: Neil Armstrong

Learning.content: A University should be a place of light, of liberty, and of learning.

Learning.content: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.

Learning.content: Do your best and keep learning - that's what I believe in.

Learning.content: Change is the end result of all true learning.

Learning.content: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

Learning.content: He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to stand and walk and run and climb and dance; one cannot fly into flying.

Learning.content: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
Learning.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

Learning.content: As long as you live, keep learning how to live.

Learning.content: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
