Trust.content: I am a planter - a cotton planter. I am a Southern man and a slaveholder - a kind and a merciful one, I trust - and none the worse for being a slaveholder.
Trust.author: John C. Calhoun

Trust.content: Men are able to trust one another, knowing the exact degree of dishonesty they are entitled to expect.
Trust.author: Stephen Leacock

Trust.content: I trust no one, not even myself.
Trust.author: Joseph Stalin

Trust.content: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
Trust.author: Paul Sweeney

Trust.content: We are all selfish and I no more trust myself than others with a good motive.
Trust.author: Lord Byron

Trust.content: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
Trust.author: Corrie Ten Boom

Trust.content: Advice number one: listen to your gut - it's never gonna lead you wrong. Number two: trust yourself. The root of everything is self-belief.
Trust.author: Russ

Trust.content: When consumers purchase a Toyota, they are not simply purchasing a car, truck or van. They are placing their trust in our company.
Trust.author: Akio Toyoda

Trust.content: We must weed out corruption and build a strong system of justice that the people can trust.
Trust.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

Trust.content: Someone that you obviously can trust and someone that you would trust your life with - that's a really good friend.
Trust.author: Ron Hall

Trust.content: I learned you can't trust the judgment of good friends.
Trust.author: Carl Sandburg

Trust.content: He that takes truth for his guide, and duty for his end, may safely trust to God's providence to lead him aright.
Trust.author: Blaise Pascal

Trust.content: All I have seen teaches me to trust the creator for all I have not seen.
Trust.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Trust.content: I have blind trust in people. Even if that ends up hurting me, I won't change. I will go on trusting people because that's the only way I know to love someone.
Trust.author: Bipasha Basu

Trust.content: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.
Trust.author: Zig Ziglar

Trust.content: The harder I train every day on the track and in the gym, the more trust I gain in myself.
Trust.author: Miguel Cotto

Trust.content: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth; the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence.
Trust.author: Democritus

Trust.content: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do.
Trust.author: Benjamin Spock

Trust.content: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
Trust.author: Billy Wilder

Trust.content: Trust your gut. You know yourself, so don't let somebody else tell you who you are.
Trust.author: Tatiana Maslany

Trust.content: Trust in what you love, continue to do it, and it will take you where you need to go.
Trust.author: Natalie Goldberg

Trust.content: I trust you: That's huge. That's truth. That's real love. Everyone uses 'I love you' so loosely.
Trust.author: Justin Chatwin

Trust.content: Young men, trust God, and make the future bright with blessing. Old men, trust God, and magnify him for all the mercies of the past.
Trust.author: Charles Spurgeon

Trust.content: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
Trust.author: Albert Einstein

Trust.content: The most special relationships, in my experience, are based on a combination of trust and mutual respect.
Trust.author: Charles Kennedy

Trust.content: It's that preparation that goes into each week. We have a term: 'Trust your training, trust your teammate, and trust yourself.'
Trust.author: Dan Quinn

Trust.content: Even an animal, if you show genuine affection, gradually trust develops... If you always showing bad face and beating, how can you develop friendship?
Trust.author: Dalai Lama

Trust.content: All the blessings we enjoy are Divine deposits, committed to our trust on this condition, that they should be dispensed for the benefit of our neighbors.
Trust.author: John Calvin

Trust.content: Trust is that rare and priceless treasure that wins us the affection of our heavenly Father.
Trust.author: Brennan Manning

Trust.content: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
Trust.author: Stephen King

Trust.content: I've spent years trying to time up my drops with my throws. You learn to listen to your feet and trust your positions.
Trust.author: Aaron Rodgers

Trust.content: In God I trust, so I'm kept going and kept training to follow my dream.
Trust.author: Cris Cyborg

Trust.content: Never trust a man, who when left alone with a tea cosey... Doesn't try it on.
Trust.author: Billy Connolly

Trust.content: Trust the Canadians to produce a game about mutual funds that is actually more boring than the real thing.
Trust.author: Alex Berenson

Trust.content: I'm a dirt person. I trust the dirt. I don't trust diamonds and gold.
Trust.author: Eartha Kitt

Trust.content: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
Trust.author: Steve Wozniak

Trust.content: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
Trust.author: Eminem

Trust.content: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain.
Trust.author: J. K. Rowling

Trust.content: All I know is that I'm a sinner and that God has forgiven me of my sins. Because I put my faith and trust in Jesus Christ.
Trust.author: Franklin Graham

Trust.content: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.
Trust.author: George MacDonald

Trust.content: Trust should be the basis for all our moral training.
Trust.author: Robert Baden-Powell

Trust.content: If you don't trust the pilot, don't go.
Trust.author: Denzel Washington

Trust.content: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.
Trust.author: Susan B. Anthony

Trust.content: Childlike surrender and trust, I believe, is the defining spirit of authentic discipleship.
Trust.author: Brennan Manning

Trust.content: They that trust in the Lord shall never be confounded!
Trust.author: George Muller

Trust.content: Trust me: Every entrepreneur has felt like an utter loser at some point.
Trust.author: Caroline Ghosn

Trust.content: The vote is a trust more delicate than any other, for it involves not just the interests of the voter, but his life, honor and future as well.
Trust.author: Jose Marti

Trust.content: Public trust is essential to public safety.
Trust.author: Martin O'Malley

Trust.content: Airbnb has proven that hospitality, generosity, and the simple act of trust between strangers can go a long way.
Trust.author: Joe Gebbia

Trust.content: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
Trust.author: Francis Bacon

Trust.content: You have got to discover you, what you do, and trust it.
Trust.author: Barbra Streisand

Trust.content: Never trust the advice of a man in difficulties.
Trust.author: Aesop

Trust.content: Something goes wrong, I yell at them -'Fix it'- whether it's their fault or not. You can only really yell at the players you trust.
Trust.author: Bill Parcells

Trust.content: Never trust any complicated cocktail that remains perfectly clear until the last ingredient goes in, and then immediately clouds.
Trust.author: Terry Pratchett

Trust.content: Although the life of a person is in a land full of thorns and weeds, there is always a space in which the good seed can grow. You have to trust God.
Trust.author: Pope Francis

Trust.content: Mike Brown wasn't about race relations, nor Trayvon Martin or even Hurricane Katrina for that matter. It's about trust.
Trust.author: Kenny Smith

Trust.content: Seize the day, and put the least possible trust in tomorrow.
Trust.author: Horace

Trust.content: Inside North Korea, we have many informants and spies watching everyone; they're paid by the government. Even a husband and wife can't trust each other.
Trust.author: Lee Hyeon-seo

Trust.content: The slogan was 'Don't trust anyone over thirty'. Sixty years later the slogan became, 'Don't trust anyone over ninety'.
Trust.author: John McCarthy

Trust.content: Logically, harmony must come from the heart... Harmony very much based on trust. As soon as use force, creates fear. Fear and trust cannot go together.
Trust.author: Dalai Lama

Trust.content: If you don't like Beyonce, then it's hard for me to trust you. It's like not liking world peace.
Trust.author: Seinabo Sey

Trust.content: The senses deceive from time to time, and it is prudent never to trust wholly those who have deceived us even once.
Trust.author: Rene Descartes

Trust.content: Every year in my life, I trust fewer and fewer people.
Trust.author: Francis Chan

Trust.content: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
Trust.author: William Shakespeare

Trust.content: We were raised in the black community not to trust the police, and I believe, in the white community, they were raised to actually be a policeman.
Trust.author: Courtney B. Vance

Trust.content: You must trust and believe in people or life becomes impossible.
Trust.author: Anton Chekhov

Trust.content: What I've learned in these 11 years is you just got to stay focused and believe in yourself and trust your own ability and judgment.
Trust.author: Mark Cuban

Trust.content: We have a great country, we are a great nation - let us trust in it.
Trust.author: Felipe VI of Spain

Trust.content: Do not trust people. They are capable of greatness.
Trust.author: Stanislaw Lem

Trust.content: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
Trust.author: Zig Ziglar

Trust.content: Let every eye negotiate for itself and trust no agent.
Trust.author: William Shakespeare

Trust.content: Government is a trust, and the officers of the government are trustees. And both the trust and the trustees are created for the benefit of the people.
Trust.author: Henry Clay

Trust.content: Astrology is interesting but not very accurate. It's a science I don't trust very much.
Trust.author: Varg Vikernes

Trust.content: Trust is built with consistency.
Trust.author: Lincoln Chafee

Trust.content: What we learn only through the ears makes less impression upon our minds than what is presented to the trustworthy eye.
Trust.author: Horace

Trust.content: If the people cannot trust their government to do the job for which it exists - to protect them and to promote their common welfare - all else is lost.
Trust.author: Barack Obama

Trust.content: I have no fear that the result of our experiment will be that men may be trusted to govern themselves without a master.
Trust.author: Thomas Jefferson

Trust.content: I am a free spirit. I am very impulsive. I put the most trust in people chance after chance, regardless of how they treat me.
Trust.author: Sasha Lane

Trust.content: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
Trust.author: Morihei Ueshiba

Trust.content: I never thought I was gullible, but I know that I trust people easily and take people on face value.
Trust.author: Taapsee Pannu

Trust.content: Even now I can't trust life. It did too many awful things to me as a kid.
Trust.author: Clara Bow

Trust.content: Most good relationships are built on mutual trust and respect.
Trust.author: Mona Sutphen

Trust.content: He who does not trust enough, Will not be trusted.
Trust.author: Lao Tzu

Trust.content: As time goes by, I realize that I do trust the wind. And I often write my songs for myself.
Trust.author: David Friedman

Trust.content: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
Trust.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Trust.content: Mature love is composed and sustaining; a celebration of commitment, companionship, and trust.
Trust.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Trust.content: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.
Trust.author: Lawrence Welk

Work.content: I enjoy the work, I enjoy every minute of my professional life.
Work.author: Jose Mourinho

Work.content: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
Work.author: Vince Lombardi

Work.content: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
Work.author: Unknown

Work.content: You see, God helps only people who work hard. That principle is very clear.
Work.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

Work.content: There is a saying that every nice piece of work needs the right person in the right place at the right time.
Work.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

Work.content: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
Work.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

Work.content: I think our family motto is to always work hard, be humble, kind, and thoughtful about others around us.
Work.author: Anwar Hadid

Work.content: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
Work.author: David O. McKay

Work.content: A good boss makes his men realize they have more ability than they think they have so that they consistently do better work than they thought they could.
Work.author: Charles Erwin Wilson

Work.content: I think the best way to get a good night sleep is to work hard throughout the day. If you work hard and, of course, work out.
Work.author: William H. McRaven

Work.content: Work hard. Through determination and self-focus and discipline, you can accomplish anything.
Work.author: Kimberly Guilfoyle

Work.content: If in our daily life we can smile, if we can be peaceful and happy, not only we, but everyone will profit from it. This is the most basic kind of peace work.
Work.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Work.content: I've had to learn to fight all my life - got to learn to keep smiling. If you smile things will work out.
Work.author: Serena Williams

Work.content: I hope the millions of people I've touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.
Work.author: Michael Jordan

Work.content: The reason a lot of people do not recognize opportunity is because it usually goes around wearing overalls looking like hard work.
Work.author: Thomas A. Edison

Work.content: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
Work.author: A. A. Milne

Work.content: Great companies are built in the office, with hard work put in by a team.
Work.author: Emily Chang

Work.content: Baseball is about talent, hard work, and strategy. But at the deepest level, it's about love, integrity, and respect.
Work.author: Pat Gillick

Work.content: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
Work.author: Mother Teresa

Work.content: I am very hands on doing my own work, all my own stunt work.
Work.author: Jodi Lyn O'Keefe

Work.content: From my dad I learned to be good to people, to always be honest and straightforward. I learned hard work and perseverance.
Work.author: Luke Bryan

Work.content: One of the great lessons the fall of the leaf teaches, is this: do your work well and then be ready to depart when God shall call.
Work.author: Tryon Edwards

Work.content: The three great essentials to achieve anything worth while are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense.
Work.author: Thomas A. Edison

Work.content: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
Work.author: Ralph Marston

Work.content: If you want small changes in your life, work on your attitude. But if you want big and primary changes, work on your paradigm.
Work.author: Stephen Covey

Work.content: There is no substitute for hard work. Never give up. Never stop believing. Never stop fighting.
Work.author: Hope Hicks

Work.content: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
Work.author: Henry Ford

Work.content: I feel like a tiger right now. There's nothing impossible if you get up and work for it.
Work.author: Michael Flatley

Work.content: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
Work.author: Elbert Hubbard

Work.content: Every man's work, whether it be literature, or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
Work.author: Samuel Butler

Work.content: Quality is everyone's responsibility.
Work.author: W. Edwards Deming

Work.content: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
Work.author: Ann Landers

Work.content: With hard work and effort, you can achieve anything.
Work.author: Antoine Griezmann

Work.content: Don't work for recognition, but do work worthy of recognition.
Work.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Work.content: There may be people who have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do - and I believe that.
Work.author: Derek Jeter

Work.content: I can only control myself, my actions, my work ethic, and my attitude.
Work.author: Ali Krieger

Work.content: I believe there are two periods in life, one for the bike, the other for becoming active on one's work.
Work.author: Bernard Hinault

Work.content: Football taught me how hard you had to work to achieve something.
Work.author: Kenny Chesney

Work.content: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
Work.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

Work.content: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
Work.author: Josie Loren

Work.content: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
Work.author: Michelangelo

Work.content: We are infected by our own misunderstanding of how our own minds work.
Work.author: Kevin Kelly

Work.content: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
Work.author: Jonas Salk

Work.content: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.
Work.author: Benjamin Franklin

Work.content: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
Work.author: Christie Brinkley

Work.content: A lot of hard work is hidden behind nice things.
Work.author: Ralph Lauren

Work.content: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
Work.author: Alex Rodriguez

Work.content: People need to be made more aware of the need to work at learning how to live because life is so quick and sometimes it goes away too quickly.
Work.author: Andy Warhol

Work.content: Hard work always wins in the end.
Work.author: Lucas Till

Work.content: Nothing is work unless you'd rather be doing something else.
Work.author: George Halas

Work.content: Good management is the art of making problems so interesting and their solutions so constructive that everyone wants to get to work and deal with them.
Work.author: Paul Hawken

Work.content: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word - excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
Work.author: Pearl S. Buck

Work.content: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
Work.author: Donovan Bailey

Work.content: Keep doing some kind of work, that the devil may always find you employed.
Work.author: St. Jerome

Work.content: Leave your ego at the door every morning, and just do some truly great work. Few things will make you feel better than a job brilliantly done.
Work.author: Robin S. Sharma

Work.content: One of the very rewarding aspects of my work has been the interaction with a superb group of colleagues and friends in the atmospheric sciences community.
Work.author: Mario J. Molina

Work.content: Man, unlike anything organic or inorganic in the universe, grows beyond his work, walks up the stairs of his concepts, emerges ahead of his accomplishments.
Work.author: John Steinbeck

Work.content: A perfect handbag is both functional and stylish. Of course you want to look cool, but you also want a bag that is going to work with you, not against you.
Work.author: Stella Maxwell

Work.content: God Bless my mother and father for all the hard work they've done for our family.
Work.author: Coy Bowles

Work.content: I like being the underdog so they don't expect what's going to happen. It pushes me to work harder and do the things I'm not doing better.
Work.author: Kawhi Leonard

Work.content: When you go all over the world for work, your dream vacation is your bedroom.
Work.author: Jack Antonoff

Work.content: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
Work.author: Saint Augustine

Work.content: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
Work.author: Pele

Work.content: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
Work.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

Work.content: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
Work.author: Dwayne Johnson

Work.content: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.
Work.author: Earl Nightingale

Work.content: Behaving like a princess is work. It's not just about looking beautiful or wearing a crown. It's more about how you are inside.
Work.author: Julie Andrews

Work.content: If you want to become a great chef, you have to work with great chefs. And that's exactly what I did.
Work.author: Gordon Ramsay

Work.content: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
Work.author: Horace

Work.content: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
Work.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

Work.content: It keeps me humble just to know exactly where I came from and all the hard work I had to put in to be here. It feels good to reminisce about the past.
Work.author: Ha Ha Clinton-Dix

Work.content: The greatest thing about where my life is right now is it's very relaxed and chill. I'm just hanging out, being myself and doing my work.
Work.author: Lucas Grabeel

Work.content: If you really believe in what you're doing, work hard, take nothing personally and if something blocks one route, find another. Never give up.
Work.author: Laurie Notaro

Work.content: Teamwork makes the dream work, but a vision becomes a nightmare when the leader has a big dream and a bad team.
Work.author: John C. Maxwell

Work.content: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
Work.author: Virat Kohli

Work.content: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
Work.author: Kevin Eubanks

Work.content: The main thing to do is relax and let your talent do the work.
Work.author: Charles Barkley

Work.content: Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
Work.author: Buddha

Work.content: Confidence doesn't come out of nowhere. It's a result of something... hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
Work.author: Roger Staubach

Work.content: If you continue to work hard, let that be the fuel to your fire.
Work.author: Pitbull

Work.content: I've been so lucky to work with such great people: people that are such hard workers and have such a respect and appreciation for one another.
Work.author: Blake Lively

Work.content: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
Work.author: Natalie Gulbis

Work.content: Football is about sacrifice, dedication, a lot of work, and friendship off the pitch.
Work.author: Edinson Cavani

Work.content: Education is a work of self-organization by which man adapts himself to the conditions of life.
Work.author: Maria Montessori

Work.content: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
Work.author: Ben Carson

Work.content: There are two kinds of people, those who do the work and those who take the credit. Try to be in the first group; there is less competition there.
Work.author: Indira Gandhi

Work.content: Hard work pays off - hard work beats talent any day, but if you're talented and work hard, it's hard to be beat.
Work.author: Robert Griffin III

Work.content: I believe that anyone can be what they want to be; it just comes down to hard work.
Work.author: Kiesza

Work.content: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
Work.author: Newt Gingrich

Work.content: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world.
Work.author: Hans Hofmann

Work.content: Some of our finest work comes through service to others.
Work.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

Work.content: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
Work.author: H. L. Hunt

Work.content: In fitness, there are no short cuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work.
Work.author: Mahesh Babu

Work.content: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Work.author: Colin Powell

Work.content: Don't worry about being a star, worry about doing good work, and all that will come to you.
Work.author: Ice Cube

Work.content: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
Work.author: Robert Frost

Work.content: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Work.author: Sasha Cohen

Work.content: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
Work.author: Elbert Hubbard

Work.content: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile!
Work.author: Og Mandino

Work.content: My dad said, 'Stay humble, and you gotta work harder than everybody else.' My mom said, 'Always be yourself.' She always told me only God can judge me.
Work.author: Nate Robinson

Work.content: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
Work.author: Peter Drucker

Work.content: If you work hard, nothing is impossible.
Work.author: Prabhu Deva

Work.content: I think leadership is more than just being able to cross the t's and dot the i's. It's about character and integrity and work ethic.
Work.author: Steve Largent

Work.content: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
Work.author: Lao Tzu

Work.content: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
Work.author: Conan O'Brien

Work.content: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday.
Work.author: Noel Coward

Work.content: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
Work.author: Calvin Coolidge

Work.content: Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work though difficult problems.
Work.author: Gever Tulley

Work.content: Play is often talked about as if it were a relief from serious learning. But for children play is serious learning. Play is really the work of childhood.
Work.author: Fred Rogers

Work.content: It is easy to make promises - it is hard work to keep them.
Work.author: Boris Johnson

Work.content: I don't have any formula. I just work with my heart, putting in a lot of hard work.
Work.author: Ranbir Kapoor

Work.content: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.
Work.author: Twyla Tharp

Work.content: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us.
Work.author: Henri Matisse

Work.content: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
Work.author: John Dewey

Work.content: Once you start a working on something, don't be afraid of failure and don't abandon it. People who work sincerely are the happiest.
Work.author: Chanakya

Work.content: Success is the result of perfection, hard work, learning from failure, loyalty, and persistence.
Work.author: Colin Powell

Work.content: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch.
Work.author: L'Wren Scott

Work.content: Hard work and dedication is important to success, and I have those qualities.
Work.author: Nargis Fakhri

Work.content: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
Work.author: Marc Anthony

Work.content: For every two minutes of glamour, there are eight hours of hard work.
Work.author: Jessica Savitch

Work.content: I know my strong points: I work hard, I have talent, I'm funny, and I'm a good person.
Work.author: Pink

Work.content: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
Work.author: Eileen Caddy

Work.content: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
Work.author: Satchel Paige

Work.content: Follow your dreams. If you have a goal, and you want to achieve it, then work hard and do everything you can to get there, and one day it will come true.
Work.author: Lindsey Vonn

Work.content: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
Work.author: Aristotle

Work.content: Effective networking isn't a result of luck - it requires hard work and persistence.
Work.author: Lewis Howes

Work.content: Be different, stand out, and work your butt off.
Work.author: Reba McEntire

Work.content: Work is much more fun than fun.
Work.author: Noel Coward

Work.content: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
Work.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

Work.content: It's important to work hard, stay humble, and not let the criticism or the compliments go to your head.
Work.author: Jessica Sanchez

Work.content: I've learned that anything in life worth having comes from patience and hard work.
Work.author: Greg Behrendt

Work.content: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
Work.author: Confucius

Work.content: If four things are followed - having a great aim, acquiring knowledge, hard work, and perseverance - then anything can be achieved.
Work.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

Work.content: Four things for success: work and pray, think and believe.
Work.author: Norman Vincent Peale

Work.content: It isn't enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn't enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
Work.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Work.content: Surround yourself with people who take their work seriously, but not themselves, those who work hard and play hard.
Work.author: Colin Powell

Work.content: To make democracy work, we must be a nation of participants, not simply observers. One who does not vote has no right to complain.
Work.author: Louis L'Amour

Work.content: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked.
Work.author: Steve Wozniak

Work.content: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
Work.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Work.content: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
Work.author: Suga

Work.content: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
Work.author: Michael Jordan

Work.content: There is no higher religion than human service. To work for the common good is the greatest creed.
Work.author: Woodrow Wilson

Work.content: Football is like life - it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
Work.author: Vince Lombardi

Work.content: Unraveling external selves and coming home to our real identity is the true meaning of soul work.
Work.author: Sue Monk Kidd

Work.content: I think it all comes down to motivation. If you really want to do something, you will work hard for it.
Work.author: Edmund Hillary

Work.content: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
Work.author: Plato

Work.content: Every training session, I work hard to improve my weaknesses and build on my strengths.
Work.author: Antoine Griezmann

Work.content: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.
Work.author: Tena Desae

Work.content: Never lose the childlike wonder. Show gratitude... Don't complain; just work harder... Never give up.
Work.author: Randy Pausch

Work.content: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
Work.author: Brad Henry

Work.content: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
Work.author: Tommy Hilfiger

Work.content: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Work.author: Thomas A. Edison

Work.content: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
Work.author: Thomas A. Edison

Work.content: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.
Work.author: Lionel Messi

Work.content: Passion is needed for any great work, and for the revolution, passion and audacity are required in big doses.
Work.author: Che Guevara

Work.content: With hard work and dedication, anything is possible.
Work.author: Timothy Weah

Work.content: You can control two things: your work ethic and your attitude about anything.
Work.author: Ali Krieger

Work.content: Your most important work is always ahead of you, never behind you.
Work.author: Stephen Covey

Work.content: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
Work.author: Stephen King

Work.content: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
Work.author: Alexander Graham Bell

Work.content: I feel I am lucky. I am grateful for this life that God has given me. I am happy, as I am getting to do work that I want to do and enjoy doing it.
Work.author: Sonam Kapoor

Work.content: Work hard. And have patience. Because no matter who you are, you're going to get hurt in your career and you have to be patient to get through the injuries.
Work.author: Randy Johnson

Work.content: One of the gifts of 'Star Trek' is my professional work colleagues have become my lifelong friends.
Work.author: George Takei

Work.content: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
Work.author: Louis Nizer

Work.content: We truly believe with hard work, dedication and perseverance, we can become the best at what we do. No one wants to become mediocre.
Work.author: Andy Biersack

Work.content: You can never go wrong when you have a great team to work with.
Work.author: Kubra Sait

Work.content: Teamwork requires some sacrifice up front; people who work as a team have to put the collective needs of the group ahead of their individual interests.
Work.author: Patrick Lencioni

Work.content: If you have a dream, it's definitely achievable through hard work, through dedication, sacrifice, everything.
Work.author: Carli Lloyd

Work.content: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.
Work.author: J. Paul Getty

Work.content: Making better choices takes work. There is a daily give and take, but it is worth the effort.
Work.author: Tom Rath

Work.content: Live like you'll die tomorrow, work like you don't need the money, and dance like nobody's watching.
Work.author: Bob Fosse

Work.content: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
Work.author: Colin Powell

Work.content: For me, real life is hard work. Making movies is like a vacation for my soul.
Work.author: Guillermo del Toro
